string-array.item: Jesse Lujack (Richard Gere) is a small-time hustler who, while leaving Las Vegas in a stolen car, shoots and kills a police officer.
A magical board game unleashes a world of adventure on siblings Peter (Bradley Pierce) and Judy Shepherd (Kirsten Dunst).

The compelling sequel to "The Godfather," contrasting the life of Corleone father and son.
When Austria\'s crown prince is found dead, evidence seems to point to suicide.
